  • Method Details

    • login

      User login(String password) throws RuntimeException
      Parameters:
      password - expects a valid password for either the store manager or the cashier
      Returns:
      a User object containing the session information about the user logged in
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if a user was not found to match the password

    • logout

      void logout()
      resets the session-specific details and logs out the user

    • isLoggedIn

      boolean isLoggedIn()
      Returns:
      true if there is a user logged in, false otherwise

    • masterCheck

      boolean masterCheck(String s)
      Parameters:
      s - expects a string containing the master password
      Returns:
      true if the password is valid, false otherwise

    • updatePassword

      void updatePassword(String role, String password)
      Parameters:
      role - expects either "StoreManager" or "Cashier" as arguments to specify the role for which the password should be changed
      password - expects the new password for the specified role

    • getUser

      User getUser()
      Returns:
      the current logged-in User, null otherwise
